acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should create instances of POJOs extending generic classes
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldCreateInstancesOfPojosExtendingGenericClasses

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.TypedClassPojo2
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class java.lang.String and class java.lang.String should be equal
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type 3cYxDu21WN
